title: The Whole Way to Natural Detoxification: Clearing Your Body of Toxins
description: Found in everything from pesticides and herbicides to noise and stress, toxins are absorbed and built up in fat cells. This comprehensive and authoritative guide offers detailed descriptions and instructions for more than 100 cleansing methods and includes special sections on restoring the body's balance after exposure to medical treatments such as radiation, chemotherapy, and anesthesia.
author: J.  Krohn
